channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Luigi Mangione set for first court appearance since his arraignment in UnitedHealthcare CEO’s death
item.description: The man accused of fatally shooting the CEO of UnitedHealthcare in New York City and leading authorities on a five-day manhunt is scheduled to be in court for the first time since his December arraignment on state murder and terror charges.

item.title: How LA wildfires are making an already tough rental market even worse
How Trump’s mass layoffs raise the risk of wildfires in the US West, according to fired workers
